CustomField.description: For Pending amount in Payment Schdule
CustomField.formula: IF( Include_Interest__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(PaymentDueDate__c)) && PaymentDueDate__c < TODAY(), MAX(( Pending_Amount__c * Interest_Percent__c * (TODAY() - PaymentDueDate__c) )/ 365, 0), 0 ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Interest Amount (for Pending Amt)
